items.content_html: An extremely lightweight HTTP request client for the command-line. Supports: http, https, proxy, redirects, cookies, content-encoding, multipart/form-data, multi-threading, recursive website crawling and mirroring.

items.content_html: El-beeswarm is a JavaScript library designed to easily create beeswarm plots. These charts are ideal for visualizing data distributions and relationships between variables. This library is lightweight, easy to use and highly customizable.
items.title: elvisthermo/el-beeswarm: El-beeswarm is a JavaScript library designed to easily create beeswarm plots. These charts are ideal for visualizing data distributions and relationships between variables. This library is lightweight, easy to use and highly customizable.
